meaningMnemonic: <radical>Narwhal</radical>s do <radical>construction</radical> with their <kanji>left</kanji> hands (or flippers, I guess). That's because all narwhals are left-handed!
readingMnemonic: In their <kanji>left</kanji> hands, the narwhals all hold <reading>saw</reading>s (さ). That's because the ice for their homes is already there, so they just need to saw away at them to make the shapes they want. Narwhal construction is actually very simple.
